    Training on Demand: Implementing VOD Server-Side Ads

    Learn how to add server-side advertising to your video playback in Brightcove Beacon.

    There is a logical order to these videos, so it is best to watch the videos in order of their appearance below.

     

    Implementing VOD Server-Side Ads (2:05)
     

    Creating an Ad Configuration (4:03)

    Key Documents
    • Implementing VOD SSAI
    • Learning Guide: Video Advertising
     

    Associating Ads with a Video (3:02)

    Key Documents
    • Implementing VOD SSAI
    • Creating Video Cloud Custom Fields
     

    Importing a Playlist into Brightcove Beacon (3:08)

    Key Document
    • Implementing VOD SSAI
